addToken(address,address,string,string,u.details: map an source token to destination

burnToken(address,uint256,address).details: burns tokens on harmony to be unlocked on ethereum

params.recipient: recipient of the unlock tokens on ethereum

lockNative(uint256,address).details: lock native tokens to be minted on other chain

params.recipient: recipient address on the other chain

lockToken(address,uint256,address).details: lock tokens to be minted on other chain

params.recipient: recipient address on the other chain
params.tokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address

mintToken(address,uint256,address,bytes3.details: mints tokens corresponding to the tokens locked in the ethereum chain

params.receiptId: transaction hash of the lock event on ethereum chain
params.recipient: recipient of the minted tokens (harmony address)
params.tokenAddr: is the token address for minting

removeToken(address,address).details: deregister token mapping in the token manager

unlockNative(uint256,address,bytes32).details: unlock native tokens after burning them on other chain

params.receiptId: transaction hash of the burn event on other chain

unlockToken(address,uint256,address,byte.details: unlock tokens after burning them on other chain

params.receiptId: transaction hash of the burn event on other chain
params.tokenAddr: is the ethereum token contract address
